# MScThesis

<!-- badges: start -->

<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of MScThesis is to **compare the clustering for bacterial flow cytometry data**.

## Installation

You can install the development version of MScThesis from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```{r,eval=F}
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("JinLin5301/MScThesis")
```
